alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 10:51AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Baton Rouge, central Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 1115 AM CDT... At 1051 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ramah, or 13 miles west of Plaquemine, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Addis, Brusly, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Ramah, Bayou Sorrel and Gardere. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 129 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge
